sentences.sContent: Should anyone be allowed to invoke any service?
sentences.sContent_eng: Should anyone be allowed to invoke any service?
sentences.sCn: 是否允许任何人调用任何服务？

sentences.sContent: You can invoke this function from anywhere in the code.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can invoke this function from anywhere in the code.
sentences.sCn: 您可以在代码中的任何地方调用这个函数。

sentences.sContent: So what do I need to do to dynamically discover and invoke the service?
sentences.sContent_eng: So what do I need to do to dynamically discover and invoke the service?
sentences.sCn: 那么，我需要做什么才能动态地发现和调用这个服务？

remMethod.val: in(进入) + vok(叫喊) + e → 叫起来 → 祈求
